reviews.text: I was surprised at how much cherry I got from this with only marzipan.  The almond almost feels like an afterthought to me, but flv cured and marzipan interact with each other to make some real magic.  I thoroughly enjoyed this one.
Awesome! Tried it after a month steep, and it taste great. Reminds me of the sucker part of the cherry tootsie roll pop. Using in my Mage rta, dual 24g 2.5mm 8 wrap
